extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Change standard password
extracted_playbook.description: Change the standard password in the web-based management to prevent unauthorized access, as attackers need valid credentials to exploit the system.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and restrict user accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Check existing user accounts for unauthorized access. Disable or remove unnecessary accounts and enforce least privilege principles.

extracted_playbook.title: Update firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security patch by updating the firmware to at least version 27.
